amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the provision in the underlying bill that blocks conscience protections at the Department of Health and Human Services.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to strike the provision in the underlying bill that blocks conscience protections at the Department of Health and Human Services.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cole amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 230 (Roll no. 266).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Cole amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 230 (Roll no. 266).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Cole.
